cause.description:
Where does Rudy Giuliani stand on Net Neutrality and Internet freedom? Nobody knows.
This group will engage in issue advocacy - hoping to convince Giuliani to break with the traditional Republican stance of opposing Internet freedom. Rudy, please...support Net Neutrality and Internet Freedom.
1. Net Neutrality is essential to the future of the Internet
2. Rudy Giuliani has a responsibility to come out in favor of Net Neutrality and Internet Freedom.
cause.mission: Convince Rudy Giuliani to support Net Neutrality and Internet Freedom
cause.name: Rudy Giuliani
